items.item_details: The Special Board Meeting will begin at 6:00 p.m. in the Board Room of the Education Center.

I pledge allegiance 
to the flag of the
United States of America
and to the Republic
for which it stands
one nation under God
indivisible with liberty
and justice for all.
Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.

items.item_details:
EAST SIDE UNION HIGH SCHOOL DISTRICT
		 
Item: 6.01
		 
SUBJECT:
Discussion and Selection of Candidate for Provisional Appointment to the Board of Trustees; Interview of Candidates Barbara Boone, Eddie Garcia and William Grasty for Provisional Appointment to Board of Trustees to fill Vacancy Resulting from Resignation of George Shirakawa, Jr.; The Board reserves the right to interview other candidates per Board ByLaw 9223 during this scheduled meeting.
items.item_text: Discussion and Selection of Candidate for Provisional Appointment to the Board of Trustees; Interview of Candidates Barbara Boone, Eddie Garcia and William Grasty for Provisional Appointment to Board of Trustees to fill Vacancy Resulting from Resignation of George Shirakawa, Jr.; The Board reserves the right to interview other candidates per Board ByLaw 9223 during this scheduled meeting.
